original_text: As for God, his way is perfect; the word of the Lord is tried: he is a buckler to all them that trust in him.
korean_text: 하나님의 도는 완전하고 여호와의 말씀은 진실하니 그는 자기에게 피하는 모든 자에게 방패시로다

sentences.original_text: As for God, his way is perfect
the word of the Lord is tried
he is a buckler to all them that trust in him
sentences.korean_translation: 그를 의지하는 모든 자에게는 방패가 되시니
